title: Can't pick masteries - An unexpected error has occured

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
In champ select, and also out of champ select this comes up every time I attempt to pick save a mastery page. Unable to have masteries selected in game because of it.

 Edit with the solution that CrazFight gave me : 
> Actually, Rineyy there is a easier way. The reason this is happening is because you have a "corrupted" mastery page. Go over to your mastery page (Not in champ select), it will auto take you to your corrupted page. Return all the points manually, click save then delete the page. The problem should be solved.

replies.body:
@CrazFight 
Thanks, that worked! Didn't the first time but after exiting the client and going to the masteries, I was able to delete it. Thanks so much for the help!

> [{quoted}](name=Blankhaven,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=PRuivbB0,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-07-26T22:04:57.179+0000)
>
> @CrazFight 
> Thanks, that worked! Didn't the first time but after exiting the client and going to the masteries, I was able to delete it. Thanks so much for the help!

Ill take credit for that resolve "Leaves the room handsomely and slowly"
please tell me what it was! im having the same problem?

The reason this is happening is because you have a "corrupted" mastery page. Go over to your mastery page (Not in champ select), it will auto take you to your corrupted page. Return all the points manually, click save then delete the page. The problem should be solved.

Repair the game by clicking the question mark icon to the top right of the patcher. Select "Repair" and let the patcher scan and repair corrupt game files. When the process is completed, you'll see the orange "Launch" button.

Actually, Rineyy there is a easier way. The reason this is happening is because you have a "corrupted" mastery page. Go over to your mastery page (Not in champ select), it will auto take you to your corrupted page. Return all the points manually, click save then delete the page. The problem should be solved.
Noted! Thank you very much and great work on the Boards! Glad to have you around. :)

I've seen this issue in the past and it often happens when one or more of your Mastery pages is corrupt. The solution I've seen work in the past is to delete all your mastery pages, relog, then create them from scratch. It should only take a few minutes and should resolve this instantly. 

Let me know if this helped.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=PRuivbB0,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-07-26T22:02:58.554+0000)
>
> I've seen this issue in the past and it often happens when one or more of your Mastery pages is corrupt. The solution I've seen work in the past is to delete all your mastery pages, relog, then create them from scratch. It should only take a few minutes and should resolve this instantly. 
> 
> Let me know if this helped.

I was able to use CrazFight's solution and it fixed the issue.
